item.description:
This presentation by Registered Professional Engineer and Volunteer with ae911truth.org, Wayne Coste, in Nashua on Aug. 27th will be the major 9-11 truth tenth anniversary event in New Hampshire! It is being sponsored by the Seacoast 9-11 Questions Group, along with the Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance.

Deb Crowder of the Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance has prepared an excellent black and white 8 1/2 X 11 inch poster that can be printed out and copied. In addition, she has prepared a larger color poster that can be placed on major bulletin boards. Contact either her or me to get the large color posters.

Now we need people to commit to large scale postering in their towns and cities in New Hampshire, especially southern New Hampshire. I'm imagining at least 30 posters each in cities like Portsmouth, Dover, Rochester, Concord, Nashua, Manchester (maybe 50 posters there), and 15-20 posters in towns like Exeter, Durham, Epping, Raymond, etc.

Please make a commitment to putting up posters in your town and reply letting me know where you will be doing this.

Thank you for whatever you can do.

FOR 9-11 TRUTH AND JUSTICE,

Dave

David Diamond

e-mail: <ddiam42@earthlink.net>
phone: 603-749-9159

 

=======================================

 

We will upload the poster to the files area of this site.
item.name: Nashua - 10 Years Later ... 9/11 Matters More Than Ever
